parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to delete all tags of the instance. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

Default value: **false**.

> This parameter is valid if parameters that contain **TagKey.N** are not specified.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can remove tags from N instances at a time. Valid values of N: **1** to **50**.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Set the value to **INSTANCE**.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The list of tag keys. You can delete N tag keys at a time. Valid values of N: **1** to **20**. The value of this parameter cannot be an empty string.
